amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove from the bill the designation as a recreational river, the 9-mile segment of the Taunton River from Muddy Cove to the confluence with the Quequechan River at the Route 195 Bridge in Fall River.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-758 to remove from the bill the designation as a recreational river of a 9-mile segment of the Taunton River from Muddy Cove to the confluence with the Quequechan River at the Route 195 Bridge in Fall River.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 235 (Roll no. 503).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 235 (Roll no. 503).
